resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This is the center of the threatening action. Indeed, the wave of Kanagawa overhangs its prey which are sailors on the foreground and Mount Fuji on the background. A circular movement is created with its little claw-like fingers and ocean-spray pointing to the mountain. Consequently, we have the impression that the monstrous wave is going to swallow sailors first and Mount Fuji then.
resource.chars: This is the center of the threatening action. Indeed, the wave of Kanagawa overhangs its prey which are sailors on the foreground and Mount Fuji on the background. A circular movement is created with its little claw-like fingers and ocean-spray pointing to the mountain. Consequently, we have the impression that the monstrous wave is going to swallow sailors first and Mount Fuji then.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The huge wave of Kanagawa can be compared to a monster. Its height takes up the length of the print which emphasises its imposing side. It has little claw-like fingers on its extremity. Numerous ocean-spray show the strength and violence of the wave.
resource.chars: The huge wave of Kanagawa can be compared to a monster. Its height takes up the length of the print which emphasises its imposing side. It has little claw-like fingers on its extremity. Numerous ocean-spray show the strength and violence of the wave.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This little wave imitates the shape of Mount Fuji which is on the background. It is a reminder of the mountain in the foreground.
resource.chars: This little wave imitates the shape of Mount Fuji which is on the background. It is a reminder of the mountain in the foreground.
